short_summary: Combat Integrated Armor Carrier System (CIACS6) Gen II Ancillary Parts
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Combat Integrated Armor Carrier System (CIACS6) Gen II Ancillary Parts

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: cb-129-50348970
- **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247887/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-10-11
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-14T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-14
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-11
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence seeks to procure ancillary parts for the Combat Integrated Armor Carrier System (CIACS6) Gen II. The items to be delivered are:

- **Item 1**: Webbing, Textile, Integral Locking Loop, NSN: 3305-20-012-4859 (Quantity: 100 EA)
- **Item 2**: Harness Kit, Flight Engineer, NSN: 3415-20-006-6530 (Quantity: 50 EA)

These items are required for delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal by December 2023.

### Supplier Requirements

- Suppliers must submit their proposals for the items above.
- Proposals must be submitted electronically through the epost Connect service.
- Bidders must provide the brand name and model, or part number, and NCAGE for any Equivalent or Substitute Product offered.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Important Note

- Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours, and limited staff, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on all procurement matters.

### Contact Information

- **Name**: Debbie Bergeron
- **Email**: <debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca>
- **Phone**: 000
- **Fax**: None
- **Address**: None

### Relevant Documents

The following documents are available upon request:

- The attached bid solicitation documents (English and French) can be found at the following links:

  - French: <https://canadabuys.canada
